FuncDef:
The control-tunnel cusp-agent command binds a cusp-agent and creates a control channel between the vBRAS-UP and vBRAS-CP.
The undo control-tunnel cusp-agent command unbinds the cusp-agent and deletes the control channel created between the vBRAS-UP and vBRAS-CP.
By default,cusp-agent is not bound in the cu-agent view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a cusp-agent.
The value is a string of 1 to 31  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the CUPS scenario, to bind a cusp-agent and create a control channel between the vBRAS-UP and vBRAS-CP, run the control-tunnel cusp-agent command.
This command is delivered by the vBRAS-CP to the vBRAS-UP.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
